definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

pinyin: yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1
yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1 zheng4

sentences.english: Another term for this condition is herniated disc.
sentences.chinese: 這種情況的另一個術語叫做椎間盤突出。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical efficacy of herbal cupping therapy for lumbago due to intervertebral disc diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察特色水藥罐治療椎間盤源性腰痛的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: A disc problem in the back, more heart trouble, a lens implant for cataracts.
sentences.chinese: 背部椎間盤問題，心臟問題，白內障晶體移植。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of the intervertebral space infection after lumbar operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腰椎間盤術後椎間隙感染的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: A herniated disk in the cervical region may cause arm pain.
sentences.chinese: 一個在頸部椎間盤突出可能導致手臂疼痛。

sentences.english: Objective To study the distribution of proteoglycan aggregate in human cervical inter-vertebral discs and its clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討頸椎間盤蛋白多糖聚合體的分佈及其意義。

sentences.english: Results One of important causes is thecervical and lumbar herniated disc.
sentences.chinese: 結果發現頸腰椎間盤突出症是本病的重要原因。

sentences.english: The ruptured disc may herniate and push against a nerve, causing pain in the low back, leg, or both.
sentences.chinese: 椎間盤破裂會疝出並擠壓神經，引起腰腿痛。
椎間盤突出咋樣治療最好。

sentences.english: Objective:To discuss clinical characteristic and treatment of silent lumbar disc herniation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討隱匿型腰椎間盤突出症的診斷與治療。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the double-interventional therapy of lumbar intervertebral disc herniation (LIDH) in the aged.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討雙介入方法對老年腰椎間盤突出症的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of far-infrared thermal graphs for the diagnosis of lumbar disc herniation(LDH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討用遠紅外熱像圖診斷腰椎間盤突出症的價值。

sentences.english: Static compression can induce degenerative-like changes in the intervertebral disc.
sentences.chinese: 靜態壓力可以對椎間盤造成退變樣改變。

sentences.english: The degree and type of intervertebral disc protrusion were observed.
sentences.chinese: 觀察椎間盤突出的程度及類型。

sentences.english: And her husband suffers from a herniated disk.
sentences.chinese: 他丈夫還患有椎間盤突出。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of lumbar disc herniation with lumbar instability.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腰椎間盤突出症合併腰椎不穩的診斷和治療。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
popliteal (anatomy)/hollow at the back of the knee
